Introduction
This topic contains general information about neurological and convulsive disorders, including
considerations in service connection (SC) for neurological disorders
identifying epilepsy
evaluating progressive spinal muscular atrophy
other organic diseases of the nervous system under 38 CFR 3.309(a)
SC of vertigo
, and
requesting examinations for manifestations of central nervous system diseases
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 12, Section A - Neurological Conditions and Convulsive Disorders
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 12, Section A
